name: National Research Corporation
description: National Research Corporation (NRC) is a leader in healthcare performance improvement, providing research and insights to help organizations enhance patient and employee experiences. Founded in 1981 and headquartered in Lincoln, Nebraska, NRC specializes in gathering and analyzing data from patients and healthcare providers to drive decision-making in hospitals and healthcare systems. The company offers a comprehensive suite of services, including patient satisfaction surveys, employee engagement assessments, and market research solutions tailored for the healthcare industry. NRC's proprietary technology and analytics platform empower clients to make informed decisions that enhance care quality, operational efficiency, and financial performance. With a commitment to advancing the healthcare landscape, NRC collaborates with thousands of healthcare organizations across the United States and Canada, enabling them to benchmark their performance and implement best practices. The company’s mission is to provide actionable insights that lead to improved experiences for patients and caregivers alike, ultimately fostering a culture of excellence in healthcare delivery. NRC prides itself on its extensive industry expertise and dedication to innovation, continuously evolving its offerings to meet the changing needs of the healthcare sector.

seo.meta_title: National Research Corporation | Healthcare Performance Improvement
seo.meta_description: Explore National Research Corporation, a leader in healthcare insights and performance improvement. Discover their innovative research solutions and commitment to enhancing patient experiences.

faq.answer: Mike Loughran is the CEO of National Research Corporation.

faq.answer: NRC is headquartered in Lincoln, Nebraska, USA.
